metadata.title: CVE-2019-19959 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ext/misc/zipfile.c in SQLite 3.30.1 mishandles certain uses of INSERT INTOin situations involving embedded '\0' characters in filenames, leading to amemory-management error that can be detected by (for example) valgrind.

criterions.comment: sqlite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
